About.paragraph: We offer free virtual tutoring to students in grades 7-12 based in Ottawa, Ontario. If you are a student looking for help you can sign-up
About.paragraph2: If you are looking to provide a valuable tutoring service to your community you can sign-up

Services.name: Resumes
Services.text: We can take a look at your resume and help you curate to present your best self.

Services.name: Interviews
Services.text: If you have a job interview lined-up we can help you answer all the questions you expect to be asked.

Services.name: Newcomers
Services.text: New to the City/Country? We can connect you to the Municipal services needed to adjust as quickly as possible.

Services.name: The Deki Project Ottawa Award
Services.text: In addiion to the scholarship database Deki Ottawa also anually has a Scholarship 3 recipients receive.

Services.name: Scholarships
Services.text: The Deki Ottawa group collected a list of scholarships highschool/university students can apply to.

Services.name: Understanding OSAP
Services.text: OSAP is commonly needed but now rarley fully understood. We want to help you get the info you need so we've developed a directory.

Features.title: School
Features.text: Find a big brother/sister that has acheived the academic goals you're aiming for.

Features.title: Work
Features.text: Find a big brother/sister that is currently in the field you hope to pursue.

Features.title: Newcomers
Features.text: Connect with other newcomers to learn about ways to adjust to your new enviornment.

Features.title: Community
Features.text: Find a big brother/sister that is currently contributing to the Eritrean community, and learn how you can do the same.
